title: Gold Rush The Game - Season 2 (MULTi13) (v1.1.6653) (RePack)
description:
Title: Gold Rush: The Game
Genre: Indie, Simulation
Developer: Code Horizon 
Publisher: Code Horizon	
Interface Language: RUS | ENG | MULTi13
Version: v1.1.6653, RePack by XATAB

For the GAME: Those of you who have never dreamt about finding a gold nugget, please raise your hand. Ok, now, gather around, because I’m about to tell you something. The rest of you can just enjoy this experience because there is nothing I can tell you to make you even more interested. It’s just a “dream come true” for all of us, right?

Features Update 1.1.6653:
- Added Drilling Machine
(The drill is now available to be used for prospecting gold in the ground - Guide will be posted on steam)
- Added De-Rocker
(A new piece of equipment to use in place of the shaker)
- Added Hotel
(You will need to go to the hotel to advance to the new season)
- Added New Claim - Nighthawk Valley
- Added Gold Map
(You can check all your boreholes done with the drilling machine, and see how many gold is beneath you)
- Added Claim Slot Mechanic
(You now need to upgrade the slot capacity for your claim; this includes multiple vehicles and equipment from the machine shop)
- Added possibility to add Hog Pan at the end of the Wash Plant System
(You are now able to ADD the hog pan to the Tier3 wash plant for extra gold)
- Unlocked New Areas on Map
(road to NH claim is now clear and ready to explore)

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
MINIMUM:
OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
Processor: Intel Core i5
Memory: 12 GB RAM
Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760
DirectX: Version 12
Storage: 13 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX compatible
Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.

HOW TO INSTALL: 
1. Mount or burn the game.
2. Install the game.
3. Play the game
